resources.string: In this menu, you can learn a signal. Enter a name for the button that we are learning and direct the remote into the IR reader and press that button.
Playback is your menu of the buttons that you\'ve learned. Pressing the learned button will emit the same signal back from the IR module.
Connectivity menu is for pairing with your IR module. Enable bluetooth on your phone and pair.
Current learned list, select one to override.
